scripts.test:integration: IMAGE_API_URL=$(cd $npm_package_config_deployment_path && terraform output image_api_url) jest test --runInBand
scripts.publish:s3: ARTIFACT_BUCKET_NAME=$(cd $npm_package_config_artifact_bucket_path && terraform output bucket_name) && aws s3 cp ./dist/*.zip s3://$ARTIFACT_BUCKET_NAME/image-api/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_config_artifact_name
scripts.list-versions: aws s3api list-objects --bucket $(cd $npm_package_config_artifact_bucket_path && terraform output bucket_name) --prefix image-api --query 'Contents[].{Key: Key, Size: Size, LastModified: LastModified}'
scripts.deploy: export TF_VAR_source_bucket=$(cd $npm_package_config_artifact_bucket_path && terraform output bucket_name) export TF_VAR_lambda_key=image-api/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_config_artifact_name && cd $npm_package_config_deployment_path && terraform apply -auto-approve -input=false
scripts.destroy: export TF_VAR_source_bucket=$(cd $npm_package_config_artifact_bucket_path && terraform output bucket_name) export TF_VAR_lambda_key=image-api/v$npm_package_version/$npm_package_config_artifact_name && cd $npm_package_config_deployment_path && terraform destroy -auto-approve -input=false
scripts.rollback: TF_VAR_source_bucket=$(cd $npm_package_config_artifact_bucket_path && terraform output bucket_name) && cd $npm_package_config_deployment_path && terraform apply -auto-approve
